statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE inventory_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_count FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE inventory_count < 5 ORDER BY inventory_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE inventory_count > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE backorder_count IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, backorder_count FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE inventory_count < 50 AND backorder_count IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, AVG(inventory_count) AS average_inventory FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 5, 7) ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE stock_level > 0
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM stock_availability WHERE product_id = 2
SELECT * FROM stock_availability WHERE backorder_level > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, backorder_level FROM stock_availability WHERE stock_level < 5
SELECT MAX(stock_level) AS max_stock FROM stock_availability
SELECT * FROM stock_availability;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM stock_availability ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, backorder_quantity, expected_delivery_date FROM backorders WHERE backorder_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, backorder_quantity, expected_delivery_date FROM stock_availability INNER JOIN backorders ON stock_availability.product_id = backorders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, COALESCE(backorder_quantity, 0) AS backorder_quantity FROM stock_availability LEFT JOIN backorders ON stock_availability.product_id = backorders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM Orders;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock, backorder_quantity FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id WHERE is_backorder = true ORDER BY order_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, backorder_status FROM products WHERE backorder_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, backorder_status FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, last_updated FROM products INNER JOIN stock_history ON products.product_id = stock_history.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, customer_name FROM products INNER JOIN backorders ON products.product_id = backorders.product_id WHERE backorder_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM stock_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE delivery_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM backorders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM stock_products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM stock_products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT s.supplier_name, o.order_date, o.delivery_date FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.product_id WHERE o.delivery_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY o.delivery_date DESC;
